name: PuzzleStation
description:
You are the sole subject of Puzzle Station. Your only goal is to find a spacesuit so that you can leave. Solve all 4 puzzle rooms to achieve your goal and escape!

Controls:

WASD- Move

Space- Jump

Left Click- Pick up objects

Devlog:

This game was made for the "Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1" with the theme set as "It is not real". 

Wow, this took more effort to make than I thought it would, since it is my first 3D game. Of which, most of that time and effort was exhausted on debugging. It was worth it in the end though, as I have learned so much.
